scripts.dev: npm run down-all && docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --build
scripts.start: npm run down-all && docker compose -f docker-compose-prod.yml up --build
scripts.down-all: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose-prod.yml down
scripts.npm-install: cd backend && npm install && cd .. && cd frontend && npm install cd ..
